control_attributes.control_description: The organization prohibits the use of [Assignment: organization-defined network accessible storage devices] in external information systems.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization provides [Assignment: organization-defined personnel or roles] with initial and [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] training in the employment and operation of physical security controls.
